channel.title: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!
channel.description:
Hello Moparscape!
I really hope that you guys can help me!
i have some problems with java and i dont know what to do!
so i hope you can help me!
MY JAVA VERSION: jdk1.6.0_20
Picture:
[IMG]http://i819.photobucket.com/albums/zz115/ZaZaScape/javacrash-1.png[/img]
Video: CLICK ON THE IMAGE BELOW TO WATCH THE VIDEO!!!!
[URL=http://s819.photobucket.com/albums/zz115/ZaZaScape/?action=view&current=Javacrash.mp4][IMG]http://i819.photobucket.com/albums/zz115/ZaZaScape/th_Javacrash.jpg[/img][/URL]
i really hope you guys can help me!

item.source: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!

item.title: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!
item.dc:creator: @Shilo_Village Shilo Village
item.description:
@Shilo_Village wrote:

[quote=“ratec, post:13, topic:350818”][quote author=buut15 link=topic=447172.msg3282586#msg3282586 date=1279977174]

What do i have to chage it to?

Edit your “run client” to…

@Echo off ECHO You may now close this window Cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit
[/quote]

Thank you!!

(Also i installed windows x64 java)

What does lowmem members 32 stay for?[/quote]

Those are the runtime arguments. Low memory, members client, 32 bit…

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ratec ratec
item.description:

Well i just want run a good rsps

so i need to download java 64 bit?

http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/widget/jdk6.jsp

Windows x64?

and edit my Bat files to what :D?

*Sorry im a noob.

Read full topic
item.source: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!

item.title: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

iBuffo:

It’s coz you have the 32 Bit JAVA. You must download the 64 bit java, and edit your compiler. 64 Bit is really hard to run RSPS’s. I had a 64 Bit comp, its not too good.

I have a 64 Bit computer. I am running a server as we speak. I just learned by myself how to edit my files to run it on 64 Bit. Not very hard.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @iBuffo iBuffo
item.description:

item.source: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!

item.title: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

Or you could do this.

@Echo off ECHO You may now close this window Cd bin "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\Javaw.exe" -Xmx254m -classpath .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 lowmem members 32 exit

You edit the run client.

Read full topic

item.source: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!

item.title: Java help! [Video & Picture inside]! - Game crashes! - Please help!
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

I know you’re using windows 7 64bit, that’s the problem
64bit Java doesn’t run RSPS Clients. Once you download 32bit Java, you need to edit the batch code so that its loading the 32bit Java.

Read full topic
